name: Gatling, Standard, Disposable, Man Portable (StdGaMP-11)
description: A standard, disposable, man-portable Gatling gun. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
